definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: The slewing mechanism consists of hydraulic motor and worm speed reducer.
sentences.chinese: 回转机构由液压马达及蜗轮蜗杆减速器组成。

sentences.english: The foundry method design of a nodular iron reductor housing with ferrite matrix was de-scribed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了铁素体基体球铁减速器壳体的铸造工艺设计。

sentences.english: The whole sieve is composed of muli-reductor units parallel.
sentences.chinese: 整台筛机可由数个减速器单元并联而成。

sentences.english: Gear Box uses the two-stage transmission made up of spiral cone-shaped gear and columned bevel wheel;
sentences.chinese: 减速器采用螺旋锥齿轮，圆柱斜齿轮二级传动。

sentences.english: In addition, the processing speed reducer do the design.
sentences.chinese: 此外还对减速器的加工工艺做了设计。

sentences.english: When the reducer has three inner planetary gears, its dynamics characteristics will be improved.
sentences.chinese: 具有三相内齿板的减速器动力学性能最好。

sentences.english: Test the lift hoist reducer and pour the oil according to the demands.
sentences.chinese: 检查提升卷扬机减速器，按照要求加注规定油面高度。

sentences.english: Abnormal noise often occurs in motor vehicle transmission system especially in propeller shaft and final reduction gear.
sentences.chinese: 汽车传动系特别是传动轴与主减速器常产生异常响声。

sentences.english: A Study on Loading Capacity of Three-ring Gear Reducer and Design for New Product Series;
sentences.chinese: 用断裂力学方法分析了三环减速器环板的疲劳寿命。

sentences.english: Stressed in the working theory and design method of hydraulic clamps style reducer.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍液压钳夹式减速器的工作原理和设计方法。

sentences.english: This is a quick stress reducer, and free of cost.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个快速应力减速器，和免费的成本。

sentences.english: The destabilizing moment test of the washing machine reducer must be carried out before the installation.
sentences.chinese: 洗衣机的减速器入厂安装前必须进行破坏力矩试验。

sentences.english: Optimization method was used in the design of the spiral bevel gear of the main reducer.
sentences.chinese: 采用优化的方法设计了主减速器螺旋锥齿轮。

sentences.english: If reducers with hard gear surface are applied, it will have long life and high mechanical efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 减速器采用硬齿面传动设计，寿命长，机械效率高。

sentences.english: The new type three-ring reducer can be used as drive mechanism of pumping units.
sentences.chinese: 该新型减速器可用作抽油机的传动装置。

sentences.english: Reducer and a general assessment of the design.
sentences.chinese: 并对减速器进行了总体评估设计。
